attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To CHANGE to the Consumer Protection legislation in relation to new car sales to INCREASE  the period of time in which a customer can return a new car to a retailer AND  to WITHOLD a portion of the cost of the vehicle until the consumer is satisfied with the vehicle.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not your name or a statement. The title of your petition is currently your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
